entities.name: gryffindor table
entities.description: The Gryï¬€indor table is mentioned as a location where people are sitting. It is described as being at the back of the hall.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a student who has collapsed in front of a dementor and is being pointed at by others.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is a student who sits down next to Ron and Harry.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron has saved seats for Harry and Hermione.

entities.name: dementor
entities.description: A dementor is a creature that has entered the train compartment and caused Harry to collapse.

entities.name: professor dumbledore
entities.description: Professor Dumbledore is the headmaster who stands up to speak. He is described as very old but with great energy.

relationships.description: Harry has collapsed in front of the dementor.
Ron saved seats for Harry and Hermione.
Hermione sat down next to Ron and Harry.
Professor Dumbledore stood up to speak to the students.
